channel.title: Cant connect
channel.description: well it says for me the server is down and when i try to connect it stays at logging in and when i check the world map people are on...

item.title: Cant connect
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The server has always backed up at *:40, and now it will restart and backup at 00:40 every night.

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:9, topic:433531”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=536253.msg3923126#msg3923126 date=1329933309]
It’s fixed. I got the message at about 12:30 am last night apparently, but I do have my phone on silent lately with a new baby, so I didn’t see it until this morning, then my internet was out for an hour.

I haven’t set it up to automatically restart yet, so I’ll do that later today.
[/quote]

how about the enchantment saving that working yet?[/quote]

No, the xAuth developer is back to work fixing up the plugin from scratch, so I’m waiting on him.

Read full topic

item.title: Cant connect
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It’s fixed. I got the message at about 12:30 am last night apparently, but I do have my phone on silent lately with a new baby, so I didn’t see it until this morning, then my internet was out for an hour.

I haven’t set it up to automatically restart yet, so I’ll do that later today.

item.title: Cant connect
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:6, topic:433531”]I’ve let him know again, literally 5 seconds after it went down but I can only assume he’s busy/doesn’t want to wake his child. All I can say is we have to wait, it’s currently 9AM and I sent it at 5AM this morning.

I’m sure there is a perfectly good reason as to why it’s down/not up yet

All I can say about the crash is that the forums were down for ~5 minutes at the time of its occurrence (ET: 4:50AM) so something obviously happened which caused it to knock the forums offline/have an affect on other things hosted on the server. Or something unrelated to MC could have knocked all services offline but MC failed to start again? Lots of possibilities as to what can/has happened.

My theory is that MITB disables le means of communication while he sleeps, if my memory serves me well those in the USA are ~6 hours behind me in England meaning he’ll be tucked up in bed dreaming dreams of dreams while we all suffer :D[/quote]

unless us americans have a fucked up sleep schedule, then we will be joining you as you suffer

Read full topic

item.title: Cant connect
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’ve let him know again, literally 5 seconds after it went down but I can only assume he’s busy/doesn’t want to wake his child. All I can say is we have to wait, it’s currently 9AM and I sent it at 5AM this morning.

I’m sure there is a perfectly good reason as to why it’s down/not up yet

All I can say about the crash is that the forums were down for ~5 minutes at the time of its occurrence (ET: 4:50AM) so something obviously happened which caused it to knock the forums offline/have an affect on other things hosted on the server. Or something unrelated to MC could have knocked all services offline but MC failed to start again? Lots of possibilities as to what can/has happened.

My theory is that MITB disables le means of communication while he sleeps, if my memory serves me well those in the USA are ~6 hours behind me in England meaning he’ll be tucked up in bed dreaming dreams of dreams while we all suffer

Read full topic

item.title: Cant connect
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I’ve restarted it because tom let me know it was down, this version seems fairly stable, since it has been running without restarts since the 15th. So I think I’ll start automatically restarting it only one time per day, if it goes down in between then, be sure to let me know.

The server was down for a few hours today (and still is), i’m not sure if lack of restarts has caused it or some other issue but if it is a problem with restarts maybe make them 3-4 times per day?

Read full topic
